name: Little Knight (Lukas)
description:
Made for the 2D Platformer Jam!

If anyone wants I can upload a .exe

Little Knight is a two button platformer, in where you can only jump or attack, go in an adventure against different enemies and traps, collect gems to open doors, and explore hand-crafted levels with a great gameplay challenge.

edit: I've made a little updated to try and fix some weird lines appearing in some levels, and changed the resolution.

If you find any problem or anything leave it in the comments!
